about_the_game:
📘Synopsis:
A young designer, currently without any freelance work, receives an offer from a young woman to work as her social media manager, helping to grow her Instagram. As his work progresses, he is introduced to an adult content app, where he starts making money and advancing in his career. However, a mystery emerges in his dreams, completely altering his perception of reality and causing new personas to surface in his life. His challenge is to guide the characters to a successful conclusion, facing these enigmas and uncovering the truth behind them. Live an intense life and embark on a beautiful story full of twists and turns.


❤️‍🔥Conversations and Story:
In this engaging game, you play as a young designer who, currently without any freelance work, is offered a position as a social media manager for a young woman, helping to grow her Instagram. As you advance through the story and interact periodically with the girl who hired you, a special connection begins to form.
As you progress, the game unlocks content featuring nudity and deeper interactions. The experience is exciting and immersive, exploring themes of friendship, love, and trust. Each advancement in the plot reveals new layers of this connection, allowing you to experience a rich narrative full of twists and turns, diving into an intense and captivating journey.


📱Clicker Game:
In Social Clicker, you manage a social media account to attract likes and views to your live stream. By clicking on likes, facing challenges like trolls and algorithms, and customizing your live stream with upgrades, you boost your online presence and develop a romance with the girl who hired you. Each click unlocks more trust from her and new interactions, offering a fun and addictive experience.



🍑💦CensorMode
The game includes adult content, but offers a "Safe Mode" to censor this content on regular days. Players can disable the censorship for a complete and relaxed experience when desired.


🔞Sex Game
After building a connection and developing a closer relationship, you'll have the opportunity to engage in sexual activities in the game. However, to fully enjoy these interactions, it's important to upgrade your home, as no one wants to visit a messy place!

content_descriptors.notes: Our game includes romance, nudity, and explicit sex scenes, integrated into the storyline to deepen character relationships. These elements are used contextually, enriching the narrative and making the experience more immersive and meaningful.
